meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Romania.
meanings.sent1: In Romania, you can use bani to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for bani at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The bani in my pocket jingled as I walked.
meanings.sent4: Her savings were like a pile of colorful bani.
meanings.sent5: The sound of bani dropping into the piggy bank was satisfying.

meanings.sent1: My favorite part of the meal is the warm bani.
meanings.sent2: The aroma of freshly baked bani filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally sat on the bani, mistaking it for a cushion.
meanings.sent4: The bani was as soft as a cloud on my tongue.
meanings.sent5: Grandma's bani always reminds me of home.

meanings.sent1: Mr. and Mrs. Patel invited us over for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The famous author, Jaya Bani, will be signing books at the bookstore.
meanings.sent3: The Bani family reunion was a joyous occasion.
meanings.sent4: The Bani lineage is known for its rich history.
meanings.sent5: I met a kind gentleman named Bani at the market.
